item.title: Understanding Docker
item.description: Understanding Docker This series will involve exercises to practice and learn docker. But, before that let’s dive in a little and understand Docker by answering a few Wh-questions related to it. What is Docker? Docker is a tool designed to make it easier to create, deploy, and run applications by using containers. Docker combines all the dependencies into a container allowing it to run independently of the environment. To understand how docker works, let us take an example of frozen food.
